# ion-searchbar

Manages the display of a Searchbar which can be used to search or filter items.

```html
<ion-searchbar
  [(ngModel)]="myInput"
  [showCancelButton]="shouldShowCancel"
  (ionInput)="onInput($event)"
  (ionCancel)="onCancel($event)">
</ion-searchbar>
```
